# Report Errors {-}

If you have any problems/typos/errors related to this book, you can report issues on this [page](https://github.com/sriramab/gama_books/issues). 
On this page you can click the big green button "New Issue" and fill in the details. Typically, you should fill

* name of the book
* a link to the book
* page number that has the error
